title: Pset_ValveTypeFlushing
description:
Valve that flushes a predetermined quantity of water to cleanse a WC, urinal or slop hopper.
Note that a flushing valve is constrained to have a 2 port  pattern.

FlushingRate.title: FlushingRate
FlushingRate.description: The predetermined quantity of water to be flushed.

HasIntegralShutOffDevice.title: HasIntegralShutOffDevice
HasIntegralShutOffDevice.description: Indication of whether the flushing valve has an integral shut off device fitted (set TRUE) or not (set FALSE).

IsHighPressure.title: IsHighPressure
IsHighPressure.description: Indication of whether the flushing valve is suitable for use on a high pressure water main (set TRUE) or not (set FALSE).
